!Mushika: You are not only brave, but also humble. Outsider -- no, now my friend -- I am in your debt. But I must ask you for help in a still more serious matter. We Elrokians have a saying:"A brave warrior wears a bell necklace that calls danger." It seems to apply to you as well. [Quest _125_InTheNameOfEvilPart1 32114-04.htm|"What do you mean?"]
